body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Andrew Morris and the customer's name is Tiffany Henderson.  The conversation is about Baking Bread (a Bakery ) and is a conversation about pricing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Andrew Morris, and I represent Baking Bread, your favorite local bakery. How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Andrew, my name is Tiffany Henderson. I'm interested in learning about your pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Tiffany! I'd be happy to assist you with that. Can you tell me what specific items you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm really curious about your sourdough bread and your artisan baguettes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Our sourdough bread is priced at five dollars each, and the artisan baguettes are three dollars each. Would you like to inquire about bulk pricing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, that would be helpful! I'm planning a small event.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: For orders of ten or more loaves, we offer a discount of ten percent. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number to send you more details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is tiffany.henderson at gmail dot com, and my phone number is two zero two - five five five - one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Tiffany! I’ll send the details of our pricing and bulk discounts to your email. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Tiffany, and we look forward to serving you at Baking Bread. Have a wonderful day!
